summary: this year's ERS International Congress will take place in London for the first time. there are just a few weeks left to get the early-bird discount for registration. the ERS primary care programme will focus on the latest updates and challenges in the field. ERS books, including the ERS Monographs, ERS Handbooks and European Lung White Book, are available online at www.ersbookshop.com and www.erspublications.com.
